item.title: Write Stuff Down
item.description: Writing as a way to think clearly and articulate your thoughts.

item.title: My Blog Setup and Writing Process
item.description: I’ve been writing blogs for almost three years now. Recently, I’ve been putting a lot of effort into building and maintaining my blog. This article documents my blog setup and my writing process from idea to publishing.

item.title: Why Developers Should Blog
item.description: I have been blogging ever since I started out as a software engineer. Here is why you should do it too.
